程序包 Models

类 Phases

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • Models.Phases
  • public class Phases
extends java.util.Observable

    Phase

    This class that controls logic of the game

        返回:

      • attackValidation

        public boolean attackValidation​(Country sourceCountry,
                                Country targetCountry,
                                int attackDice,
                                int defendDice)
                         throws Models.AttackingCountryOwner,
                                Models.AttackedCountryOwner,
                                Models.WrongDiceNumber,
                                Models.AttackCountryArmyMoreThanOne,
                                Models.TargetCountryNotAdjacent
        For checking validation in attack phase
        参数:
        sourceCountry - source country
        targetCountry - target country
        attackDice - number of attacker's dice
        defendDice - number of defender's dice
        返回:
        true for validation
        抛出:
        Models.AttackCountryArmyMoreThanOne - the number of army in attacking country must more than one
        Models.AttackingCountryOwner - the owner of attacking country must be current player
        Models.AttackedCountryOwner - the owner of attacked country must be the enemy
        Models.WrongDiceNumber - the wrong dice number
        Models.TargetCountryNotAdjacent - the Target Country Not Adjacent

      • deploymentAfterConquer

        public boolean deploymentAfterConquer​(Country from,
                                      Country to,
                                      int num)
                               throws Models.MustBeEqualOrMoreThanNumOfDice,
                                      Models.SourceIsTargetException,
                                      Models.NoSuchPathException,
                                      Models.CountryNotInRealms,
                                      Models.OutOfArmyException,
                                      Models.MoveAtLeastOneArmyException
        deployment After Conquer
        参数:
        from - current country
        to - conquered country
        num - number of army assigned
        返回:
        true for assign success
        抛出:
        Models.MustBeEqualOrMoreThanNumOfDice - throw exception
        Models.SourceIsTargetException - throw exception
        Models.NoSuchPathException - throw exception
        Models.CountryNotInRealms - throw exception
        Models.OutOfArmyException - throw exception
        Models.MoveAtLeastOneArmyException - throw exception
